links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(log(2)/log(10)); for (n=1, 20000, write("b028232.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Apr 15 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: Added an allocatemem statement to my PARI program. - _Harry J. Smith_, Apr 18 2009
